name: Pandemonium (Yes Good Stuff)
description:
Pandemonium, my horrible rushed game for the Brackeys 2021.2 Let There Be Chaos Game Jam.

Don't play in fullscreen the aspect ratio is weird and you miss out on a lot

Play as a spaceship (or whatever you would like to call it) and protect the crystal from incoming waves of enemies.

UPDATE: Updated files so the game will actually run.

UPDATE: The music no longer wants to kill you ears
